abstract: Where are all the gay vampires, werewolves, witches and just plain ordinary kids-in-a-story (as opposed to kids-with-a-story)?
snippet: Where are all the gay vampires, werewolves, witches and just plain ordinary kids-in-a-story (as opposed to kids-with-a-story)?
lead_paragraph: If you are a gay teenage reader, you can find a relative abundance of books on coming out, coming to terms with a gay identity, questioning your sexuality or wrestling with prejudice.

headline.main: Why So Few Gay Characters in Teen Fiction?
